name: Sanguo: War Under Heaven
description:
In the year 221, ALL UNDER HEAVEN was at WAR.

Sanguo: War Under Heaven is a real-time strategy game (RTS) that lets you command an army entirely of your choosing.

  • Army Customization: Freely decide what armor your men wear, which weapons they wield, and whether they ride on horseback or march on foot -- millions of army combinations are possible.
  • Pure Tactics: During each battle, combine skillful maneuvers with brute force. There is no base building or resource gathering to divert your focus from victory.
  • Unique Music Presentation: Immerse yourself in the ever-changing sound of Spontaneous. Sanguo's background music themes use different instrument combinations each time they play. Hear over 2 million variations alongside the clash of war.
